revised_title: The Life and Contributions of Sir Edward Albert Sharpey-Schafer
tldr: The article is an obituary for Sir Edward Albert Sharpey-Schafer, a distinguished physiologist who made significant contributions to the field of physiology, including research on cerebral localization, histology, and the endocrine organs. He was a Fellow of the Royal Society and received multiple awards for his work. His book "Essentials of Histology" has been widely used in medical education.
